talk.utter:
Heard an incredible line from Shola Richards today, who says he never tries to win over bigots: 
“Honeybees have never wasted a minute of their time trying to convince flies that honey tastes better than shit” 🐝😃💛
Don’t *debate* people’s humanity with those who don’t respect it 💥

talk.author: did:plc:efisyjhyaue4qplmoxtkizvn
talk.utter: Then how to change the bigots' minds? 🤔 Asking for my Black trans friend in the mirror…

talk.author: did:plc:jub6vadsfjtaieogcyomjnyv
talk.utter: We don’t. We change the minds of the people sitting on the fence, asking them to join us in building a world the worst of us have less influence in 👍🏼
